A3JGroups

Class ElectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • A3JGroups.ElectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ElectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    ElectionManager is a Thread used by the follower who carry out the election of the new supervisor. You have to define the electionTime (10000ms as default) in which to await the results. The ElectionManager is created in automatic by the first follower of the groupMember List of the Jchannel view.
    Author:
    bett.marco88@gmail.com
